name: Dream Raider
overview: Released in the German language magazine known variously as Starlight or C64 Starlight in issue #5. Released in Italy as Sogno in both Hit Parade C64 n.69 (luglio/agosto 1992) and New Special PlayGames n.48 (giugno 1992). The hero of the game is a cute little green monster who got lost in a forest populated by hostile beings. Help our friend to get out of this nightmare and above all to defend himself from the spiders, worms and men with clubs that surround him. Remember that a simple touch from these beings will lower your life energy. Shoot them to eliminate their threat and be fast as time is ticking down. Collect the bonuses in the forest and above for the greatest success!
